Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Southbound Reroute near Damen/21st
ShortDescription: Southbound 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 18th, Ashland, Roosevelt, and Damen due to, street blockage near Damen/21st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 18th, Ashland, Roosevelt, and Damen due to, street blockage near Damen/21st.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem on a train at Western (FP). Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem on a train at Western (Forest Park branch).

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
